name: StrawintoGold
0:
”Alexa open straw into gold”
”Alexa, ask straw into gold to turn straw into gold”
”Turn hat into scarf”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: straw into gold
des:
Want to turn straw into gold? Simple!
This skill can help you convert any word into another word. For example, you can open the skill and say: 'Turn straw into gold' or 'Turn hands into feet'.
Also known as Flax to Gold, this skill is based off the story of Rumpelstiltskin. On the girl who paraded the fact she could turn straw into gold and the troubles it caused her.

To use this skill, simply open it by saying 'Alexa, open Straw into Gold'.
Then you can ask for transformations by saying: 'Turn hands into feet', 'turn food to drink' or any other words you want.
After the skill has transformed a word for you, you can ask for an explanation and it will go through and explain what it changed each time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
